title: Capybara Go!
description: Enter the wonderful world of Capybara. In Capybara Go, begin a strategic adventure. You'll be forming and commanding your own little Capybara army. Defeat your opponents and conquer everything through strategy and combat. Lay out your Capybara's to take advantage of each one's strengths and use strategy to defeat powerful enemies.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Obby Survive Parkour
description: Obby Survivor Parkour is a fast-paced 3D parkour and escape game designed for players who trust their reflexes. You will test both your speed and balance skills while trying to survive in the obstacle filled course! Each section is full of new traps and platforms that will challenge you even more. Try to survive tsunami waves, obstacle courses, lava attacks, snowball storms and red light green light game and reach the finish line. Can you be one of the few who can reach the end of the course?
instructions: PLAYER 1: Movement: "W,A,S,D" Jump: "SPACE" Double Jump: "SPACE + SPACE" Freeze: "Q" Bomb: "E" Acceleration: "F" PLAYER 2: Movement: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "J" Double Jump: "J + J" Freeze: "H" Bomb: "K" Acceleration: "L" Touch controls will be automatically activated on mobile devices such as tablets and phones.

title: Geometry Vibes Monster
description: Geometry Vibes Monster is a reaction-based arcade game where you must dodge incoming obstacles, spikes, and battle against a variety of unique monsters. Each monster features distinct attack patterns that you must skillfully avoid. Your main goal is to navigate your spaceship as far as possible while surviving the onslaught of attacks.
instructions: Keep your spaceship on course and avoid hitting obstacles. Stay alert for the specific attack patterns of each monster. Click and hold the "MOUSE" or press and hold the "SPACEBAR" to ascend. Release the button to dive downward. In 2,3,4 Player race mode, "UP ARROW", "SPACEBAR" "H" and "L" are used to control.

title: Hyper Nurse: Hospital Games
description: Get ready to navigate through the fast-paced world of healthcare, where every second counts. Your mission as a hyper nurse is to provide exceptional care to patients, manage critical situations, and ensure the smooth operation of the hospital. Get ready to put your multitasking skills to the test as you juggle multiple tasks and make crucial decisions in hyper nurse: hospital games.
instructions: Use left mouse button to make choices.

title: Deep in the Lab - Chapter 1
description: Deep in the Lab is 2D '90 style survival horror game, with old style pre-rendered backgrounds, puzzles to solve, keys to collect, monster to avoid or defeat (your choice), poor resources, jumpscares, limited saves, FMV and a five floors lab to explore.
instructions: AD Move left and right P : Open/Close Menu M : Open Map ESC: Options Menu / Skip Video E: Interact / Use / Open Door CTRL: Draw / Undraw Weapon Left Click: Attack/Shoot Right Click: Roll

title: Geometry Wave Hero
description: Geometry Wave Hero is an exciting rhythm-based game that takes players on a thrilling journey through a vibrant color world. This game offers a unique twist on the classic Geometry Dash formula, focusing exclusively on the wave game mode. Players must navigate their wave through a series of challenging obstacles, using simple one-touch mechanics to control its movement.
instructions: The game features ten increasingly difficult levels, each accompanied by its own unique rhythm music that adds to the immersive experience. Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Rythm platform adventure; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

title: Br Br Patapim: Obby Challenge
description: Br Br Patapim: Obby Challenge is a wild meme-fueled obby game where you’ll jump, fall, and laugh your way through chaos! Inspired by the viral spirit of Italian Brainrot Animals of TikTok trends, this game turns parkour madness into pure comedy. Take control of the legendary Brr Brr Patapim and conquer ridiculous levels full of traps, platforms, and meme-powered surprises.
instructions: Controls: W, A, S, D – Move Spacebar – Jump Shift - Run Mouse – Look Around

title: Zombie Shooting King
description: The apocalypse is here! Hordes of zombies are swarming the streets. You are the last line of defense. Grab your gun, sharpen your shooting skills, and unleash unstoppable firepower to survive. Shoot fuel tanks, airdrops, and more to get more firepower to destroy tons of zombies. Get diamonds to upgrade your talents like Guardrail, ATK Boost, Crit Rate, or Coin earning!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Ultrahero Vs Monsters Royale Battle
description: Ultrahero Vs Monsters Royale Battle is an action fighting game where you, as a mighty Ultrahero. Battle against waves of evil monsters in a 3D world. Every battle is a new adventure. Feel the perfect fusion of tower defense and nervous arcade action in this game. As a hero, you must not only fight off monsters in epic battles but also use tower defense tactics to protect your base.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Noob: Saving friends
description: "Noob: Saving friends" - An adventure in an interesting and captivating world with Nubik. Together with Nubik, you will mine and sell ores, buy new pickaxes, upgrade skills, and try to uncover all the secrets! Will you be able to challenge the dragon and earn the maximum coins? Or maybe luck from the lucky block will smile upon you?
instructions: Your goal is to find all your friends and save them! Complete tasks to progress through the story and unlock new opportunities. Controls: For Mobile: Left joystick - Movement Right joystick - Destroy blocks Tap on the screen in an empty space - Place a block For PC: WASD/Arrow keys - Movement Left Mouse Button - Destroy blocks Right Mouse Button - Place a block Hold Shift - Work with the background layer E - Inventory F - Open shop Q - Drop item ESC - Pause

title: Chill Clicker
description: Chill Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the Chill Capybara population by clicking. You can buy various upgrades to increase the output of Chill Capybaras, change the weather, and unlock new skins to make you the coolest Chill Capybara in town.
instructions: Click to play!

title: Blocks Stack Rush
description: Enjoy an addictive stacking adventure. In Blocks Stack Rush, you’ll control a little block character running and begin a fun pixelated journey. Collect blocks, stack them high and race against time to build the perfect picture. You need to align each block and keep putting together the complete picture.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Sprunki Torches Maze
description: Light up all the torches in the room to unlock the door. Some torches are linked and will toggle together when activated. Watch out for bats! Contact with them results in a game over! Your goal is to exit the house through the front yard door.
instructions: Arrows: Move the character. Space: Toggle torches.

title: Pops Quest
description: In this story-based platformer, you'll step into the shoes of a heroic protagonist driven by an undying love for their child. Experience the perfect fusion of action and platforming as Pop's Quest takes you on a high-octane adventure. With its fast-paced gameplay levels designed, you'll be engrossed in a world that demands agility, strategy, and quick reflexes. As you progress, you'll be emotionally invested and driven to save your child from danger.
instructions: Use A / D or Left / Right Arrow Keys to move and W / Space / Up Arrow Key to Jump

title: Stickman Gun Shooter
description: Get ready to dive into a unique shooting experience with Stickman Gun Shooter! Enjoy an experience that invites you to take control of an expert shooter as you use a spinning gun to defeat fun Stickmans. The game combines realistic ragdoll physics with exciting and simple gameplay - your goal will be to destroy the yellow Stickmans that get in your way, overcoming different levels with different challenges and obstacles, while demonstrating your sniper skills!
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Shooter Physics; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

title: Robby: Bomberman
description: Dive into an exciting adventure with Robby, a brave hero who finds himself trapped in a labyrinth filled with ghosts and mysterious loot boxes. In this danger-filled world, to unlock the exit, Robby must defeat all the ghosts and destroy the crates, which may contain precious coins and useful bonuses. But Robby is not alone in his fight! He has a loyal ally—a magical mushroom that can emerge from the loot boxes to assist him in battles against the ghosts.
instructions: Clear the level of crates and ghosts using bombs to open the exit. Use the “freezer” to blow up a frozen ghost and the “shrinker” to jump over a ghost that can corner you. Destroyed ghosts can respawn as long as there are crates on the level. Mushrooms also help destroy ghosts. Upgrade them to increase their power! But be careful of the mummies! They immediately detonate a bomb. So run away to a safe distance! Collect coins and buy upgrades.

title: Donne's Spinning World
description: In this 2D puzzle-platformer, you can spin the entire world using magical leaves. Rotating the world changes gravity and helps you reach new paths. The goal is to collect all the flowers in each level. Along the way, you'll need to push boxes, open doors, and avoid spikes and silly monsters. Jump, rotate, and solve puzzles in a colorful world full of fun challenges!
instructions: Controls Move [A] / [D] or ⬅️ / ➡️ — Move left and right Rotate the world [Q] or ⬅️ — Rotate left [E] or ➡️ — Rotate right Jump [W], ⬆️ or [SPACE] — Jump Restart level [R] — Restart

title: Dino Hide N Shoot
description: Do you want to begin a fun dinosaur-themed shooting game in Dino Hide N Shoot? Play a brave gunman on an exciting adventure! In this game, you will constantly run to avoid the attack of dinosaurs.And pick up the bullets, accumulate enough firepower. Pay attention to using the box as cover,seize the moment to shoot at the dinosaur! The gameplay is simple yet challenging.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Digger Fighter in the Maze
description: Digger Fighter in the Maze is an action-packed adventure game that takes you deep into a mysterious underground labyrinth filled with secrets, dangers, and treasures. Step into the shoes of a brave digger fighter as you tunnel your way through winding mazes, uncover hidden paths, and gather valuable resources. Along the way, you'll meet and recruit powerful allies, each with unique abilities that can help you overcome obstacles and defeat fierce enemies.
instructions: Move: Swipe or use on-screen controls to navigate the maze. Dig: Tap to dig through dirt and discover hidden paths. Interact: Approach NPCs to talk, accept quests, or unlock help. Battle: Use your weapon and special abilities to fight enemies in real-time combat. Team Up: Recruit allies you meet in the maze—each with unique skills. Solve: Use levers, pressure plates, and objects to solve puzzles and unlock new areas. Prepare: Gather items and upgrade your gear to face the final boss.

title: Save the Daddy
description: Get ready to unlock a world of tricky puzzles and brain teasers in Save the Daddy. Each level is unique and carefully designed to challenge your mind and test your IQ. Pull the pin in the right order and help the man escape from dangerous monsters & obstacles safely and thoughtfully. Play each level very cautiously by analyzing your move before pulling the pin. As you progress, levels increase in difficulty which will make you game challenging and earn more rewards.
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Puzzle game; Challenge your mind; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the mouse or touch to play

title: Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge
description: Jump into the viral madness of Tung Tung Sahur: Obby Challenge — a hilarious meme-based platformer where you dodge traps, jump across chaos, and try to survive with style. Inspired by trending TikTok memes, especially the absurd world of Italian Brainrot Animals. Play as the one and only meme legend, Tung Tung Sahur, and conquer chaotic Obby parkour levels like never before.
instructions: Controls: W, A, S, D – Move Spacebar – Jump Mouse – Look Around

title: Swordsman Adventure
description: Swordsman Adventure is a thrilling adventure game where you wield your sword freely on the battlefield to complete a series of missions. In this role-playing game, you control your soldier to attack enemies of different hit points. You get rewards at the end of each mission completed, which you can use to upgrade your attack points or to equip with a new weapon.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stickboys Hook
description: Swing with Stickboys and jump your way to the finish line. Stickboys needs your help. Assist him and reach the goal! Jump from launch ramps and shoot webs to get to the end. You must complete every level. Be careful — if you fall from the sky, you lose the game.
instructions: *Click or tap to rope. *20 different challenging levels. *Mobile controls available

title: Deadly Parkour
description: Dynamic Duo: Take control of two distinct characters, each with their own strengths and abilities. Precision Platforming: Immerse yourself in the thrilling world of precision platforming, where every jump matters. Test your reflexes and hone your skills as you traverse 70 meticulously hand crafted levels.
instructions: Use arrow or WASD keys to move and Spacebar/X/J keys to performer the character's special hability. Reach to the portal to complete the level.

title: HeroBall Adventures 2
description: It’s time to embark on a brand new adventure in this great game, this time in a spherical theme! Heroball Adventures 2 is finally here! It’s a fun game where heroball has to save his friends who were abducted by a strange machine on an otherwise calm day. Control the character, jump over obstacles and try to save all of your friends. Be sure to try to get to the end of each level. Collect points and unlock new abilities!
instructions: Easy to understand; Nice and addictive gameplay; Platformer game; Frenetic adventure; Awesome HD Graphics; Challenging levels , Use the keyboard or screen buttons to play

title: Tower Defense
description: In Tower Defense, you will direct a powerful army of defense towers to face enemy attacks. Arrange your defense towers carefully and develop the strategy to repel the enemy. Each tower has different attack powers and abilities. Unlock the right type and placement. Update your soldiers to help you battle. Use your crossbow to take them out.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: DTA: Best Thief
description: Can you steal everything without getting caught? Test your agility and cunning! In "GTA: Top Thief" you will find: - Lots of shops and difficulties with different goods - Smart administrators – be careful! - Improve your skills - become stealthier and faster - Steal from sprunky, roblox and granny - Go through the story with exciting quests - Collect pets and stand out among thieves Each successful heist brings you closer to the title of the best thief in "GTA: Top Thief"!
instructions: To become the best thief you need: - Enter the game - Swinging in prison - Help Billy in his storyline - Use the tunnel to get to the location - Steal from stores using a box - Don't get caught with a box in your hands - Take everything you can out of the store!

title: Bbq Stack Run
description: Enter a running arcade adventure filled with food and fun challenges. BBQ Stack Run takes you through the craziest BBQ-collecting parkour ever. Pick up various ingredients such as beef, chicken, sausage and more on the track as you run. Sprinkle them with barbecue seasoning and cook them through.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Granny GTA Vegas
description: Granny GTA Vegas drops the infamous horror legend into the heart of sin city! Armed and unhinged, Granny escapes her haunted house and brings chaos to the neon streets of Las Vegas. With red-hooded masked enemies hot on her trail, she must shoot her way through crime-ridden alleys, casino districts, and the Vegas Strip.
instructions: mouse only

title: Parkour Block 7
description: Skill game, classic mode from your favorite games right in the browser on your computer and phone! More levels and more mechanics await for you
instructions: Desktop: • SPACE - jump • WASD - move • L. SHIFT - running • Double Escape - Menu Mobile: • Touch

title: The Best Warrior
description: In The Best Warrior, you start as a humble peasant with one goal—to become the greatest warrior in the kingdom. Train by clicking on dummies to build attack power, defeat enemies for gold, and unlock powerful skins to grow even faster. Face epic bosses, collect timed chest rewards, and rise through multiple levels. With nonstop action, upgrades, and progression, this free adventure clicker game lets you prove your strength with every tap. Start your journey now and become a legend!
instructions: WASD/Arrows: Move Left Click: Attack

title: Agent Zero: Infiltration
description: Agent Zero: Infiltration – The Ultimate Stealth Action Game! Step into the world of espionage, stealth, and high-stakes action in Agent Zero: Infiltration! As an elite covert operative, your mission is to infiltrate enemy bases, eliminate threats, and uncover top-secret intelligence. Use strategy, precision shooting, and stealth tactics to outsmart enemies and complete high-risk missions. Can you survive the danger and complete your objective?
instructions: drag to control

title: Cat Chaos Simulator
description: Begin a fun 3D cat simulator adventure in the Cat Chaos Simulator. As a mischievous cat, chaos occurs in various scenes. Such as houses, parks and so on. Knocking over things, or messing with humans. In the Room Naughty, you jump on tables, knock over cups, destroy computers, etc. Keep destroying the furniture and see how far you can go with your mess value.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Parkour Obby
description: Dive into the ultimate parkour adventure with Parkour Obby! Immerse yourself in a world of stunning, blocky beauty inspired by iconic Minecraft graphics. Leap, sprint, and climb through meticulously crafted levels, each more breathtaking than the last. From towering cliffs to dazzling pixelated landscapes, every jump tests your skills, timing, and creativity.
instructions: WASD = Move Mouse = Look Around Space = Jump Use Mouse to

title: Gangsta Duel
description: Gangsta Duel is an exciting street duel game that brings you into a world of battles. Face off against the street Gangsta. In this game, you will fight a large wave of enemies. Use your skills to attack and destroy all your enemies. Unleash powerful combat skills and make your enemies feel the absolute blow.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Moto Trials Rush
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of Motorcycle Racing, where driving skills are essential! Dodge obstacles, avoid flying sledgehammers, and leap over spikes—your path to victory depends on it! Each new level presents a unique challenge, where quick reflexes and sharp focus are your best defense!
instructions: Use the arrows ⬆️⬇️ or "WS" to move and ⬅️➡️ or "AD" to spin. Sometimes you’ll need to slow down, and other times you’ll need to speed up to win. Try different tactics. If your bike gets stuck, press ⬅️➡️ or "AD" to hop!

title: Snowflight
description: In this game, you control the flight of a bird, exploring snowy landscapes and enjoying the winter atmosphere. Various game modes await you: explore the world, search for hidden items, and take part in thrilling competitions. Each mode offers unique challenges, allowing you to test yourself in different aspects of the game and create unforgettable experiences.
instructions: Tab - Pause Mouse Movement - Control flight direction Left Mouse Button - Acceleration

title: Granny Returns 3D : Evil Destiny
description: Step into a terrifying haunted house in Granny Returns 3D Evil Destiny, where danger lurks around every corner. Trapped in a sinister mansion, your only goal is to escape before the evil granny finds you. Solve intricate puzzles, search for hidden keys, and move silently to avoid detection. With immersive 3D graphics, eerie sound effects, and unpredictable jump scares, this game will keep you on edge.
instructions: W A S D to move O To View Objective Left Shift To Run Mouse To Look E to Interact/Hide Q to Unhide Space To Jump C To Crouch G To Drop Th

title: Roblox Craft Run
description: Welcome to begin a 3D running adventure full of speed and creativity in Roblox Craft Run. In this pixel-craft game, you'll control your character as he runs and jumps around an exciting platform track. Jump across the bridge and walk into a new level. Start your journey through the maze. Challenge your jumping skills and strategy.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Dynamons 11
description: Embark on a brand new Dynamons adventure in Dynamons 11! This online monster collecting game includes two fresh areas to explore; Guardian Island world and the bonus cave. Seasoned Dynamons connoisseur Jovani will tell you everything you need to know to become a true Dynamon Captain. Encounter Chyroax, Scorvenox, Axolotix, Uryndur, Skyvioru, Golunaryx and many more special Dynamons. Recruit them for your team and beat others in thrilling 1v1 battles with special attacks and power-ups.
instructions: Play the game using touchscreen controls or your mouse. The game consists of spellbinding turn-based battles. You can use the action cards to attack, and catch the opposing creature when it’s weakened. The backpack is filled with items you can collect and use during your journeys. By selecting it during battle, you can access these special items. Use shards to level up your Dynamons, and to gain new action cards. Challenge other trainers and become the strongest Dynamon Captain!

title: The Superhero League
description: Want to join the Superhero League and unlock endless puzzle fun? In The Superhero League, you’ll become a superhero and begin an exciting puzzle adventure. Take on various killing missions, solve puzzles, and save the world. Control your hero through challenging levels and become the strongest hero of all! This creative puzzle game combines superhero elements with rich strategy gameplay.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: sprunki character maker OC
description: The Sprunki Character Maker OC is an interactive tool that allows users to create their own unique characters within the Sprunki universe. Featuring a wide range of customization options, assets, and design tools, it empowers players to craft characters that match the game’s distinctive art style and themes. This experience encourages creativity, self-expression, and deeper engagement with the Sprunki community
instructions: Click Customization – Easily place and modify features with an intuitive interface.

title: Sprunki Lava Escape 2Player
description: Together with your friend, you must save the Sprunki characters from the rising lava. You must be very careful. The lava is rising, and you're in danger. Escape the lava with 6 different characters and jump as high as you can. An endless jumping and lava escape awaits you. Collect all the music notes along the way. You need the music notes.
instructions: Use the WASD keys to move and jump in the game. Use the Arrow Keys keys to move and jump in the game. *Mobile Control Available

title: Larry World
description: A fun and challenging platformer game inspired on the greatests classics of its kind. Help Larry to pass through 4 fantastic worlds.
instructions: Mobile Devices: touch buttons. Desktop devices: move with Arrows or WASD keys. Shot with spacebar (needs the power up).

title: Super Onion Boy 2
description: Super Onion Boy 2 is a 2D retro-style adventure game where your mission is to save your friend, who has been captured by a terrible monster with psychic powers. Defeat enemies along the way using superpowers and epic transformations, collect coins and stars to earn extra lives, find chests with magic potions, and defeat all the terrible bosses until you reach the final showdown.
instructions: AD / left and right arrow keys = move to the left and right. Z / K /Space = jump X / J = use power (when available) P / Tab = pause

title: Fishing Baron Real Fishing
description: Fishing Baron Real Fishing is a casual fishing simulator that offers a realistic fishing experience. Enjoy a relaxing and challenging fishing journey. Become a fishing master. Start a fishing adventure across various beautiful fishing locations. From lakes to oceans, you can unlock different areas to fish. Each location has unique fish species and environments.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hunt And Seek
description: Ready for a challenge of intellect and strategy? In Hunt And Seek, enter an adventure world filled with puzzles that will stimulate your brain as you search for hidden characters! This game offers endless fun and challenges, suitable for boys and puzzle enthusiasts! At the beginning of each level, an arrester is randomly selected. At the beginning of each level, a random arrester is selected to become a giant and start hunting.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Ball and Girlfriend
description: Our ball's girlfriend is in danger! They lock her in a cage and hide the key! You need to find the key and save your beloved Girlfriend! There are many levels, different locations, enemies, dangerous obstacles, good graphics and much more! There will be a boss in the last level! Collect hearts to increase your health! There are 3 difficulty levels to choose from! There is one hidden emerald in each level, find the secret passage to it!
instructions: To control, use the W, A, D keys, or the arrows on the keyboard. From your phone, press the arrows on the screen.

title: Army Commander Craft
description: Welcome to Army Commander Craft, a game full of strategy and shooting elements. As a commander, building and upgrading your army. Lead them into nervous battles against enemy forces.Command your army to begin nervous shooting battles. Defeat the enemy units with precision and strategy.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Nuclear Day Survival
description: Can you survive in a world where there was a nuclear explosion? There is radiation, hunger, disease and suffering around you. Your goal is to escape the dying city and find the love of your youth. A unique atmosphere and a heart-piercing plot. Uncover the mystery of the missing documents and make a choice: save the people around you or leave them to die.. Peculiarities: — Crafting system — Unique plot — Exploring an interesting world
instructions: The goal of the game is to survive in an apocalyptic world after a nuclear explosion by uncovering secrets and making moral choices, including saving others or acting in your own self-interest. Controls on desktop: WASD for movement, Left mouse button for interaction, E for inventory, J for tasks, M for store. Control on a mobile device: touch/swipe.
